expertise.title: Design & Engineering Excellence
paragraphs: My expertise spans the full spectrum of digital product development, from initial UX research to final implementation.
I've led design and engineering teams at various company scales, from startups to major corporations like Sony.
Currently mentoring teams of product designers and engineers, helping them bridge the gap between design thinking and technical implementation.

feature.title: Location & Experience
paragraphs: Since relocating to the United States in 2002, I've built my career across key innovation centers. At Sony Los Angeles, I led digital entertainment experience initiatives.
In San Francisco, I immersed myself in the startup ecosystem, working with emerging technologies. Later in New York, I helped scale automotiveMastermind while mentoring product teams.
Currently based in South Florida, I maintain strong connections with global technology hubs while embracing remote work culture.

social.quote: Great design is invisible. Great engineering makes it possible.

creative.title: Creative Outlets
content: Since I was 3 years old I was into drawing using a variety of mediums: pen sketching, ink, markers, color pencials, watercolors, goache, acrilics, and eventually iPad with a digital pen (my current method). See more on @details_sketchy on Instagram.
In years 2002-2013 I actively produced music in the style of psy-trance under the moniker Konflux (tunes on YouTube).
2012-2017 I had a project called Synter dedicted to a house/techno + electro/trance blend of genres.

bio.title: Who Is Simon?
bio.subtitle: Digital marketing expert and AI implementation expert
paragraphs: As a globe-trotting digital marketer and AI expert, I've helped businesses across 40 countries harness the power of technology and marketing to achieve their goals.
My journey has taken me from the vibrant streets of Thailand to the beaches of Brazil, my two favorite destinations among the many countries I've explored.
With expertise in digital marketing, web design, and artificial intelligence, I help entrepreneurs break through their blocks and establish powerful online presences.

expertise.title: Marketing & Technology Mastery
paragraphs: I specialize in digital marketing strategy, advertising optimization, and AI implementation for businesses.
My approach combines web design expertise with cutting-edge AI tools to create powerful online presences.
Speaking four languages has allowed me to work with diverse clients across cultural boundaries.
I've helped countless entrepreneurs transform their digital presence and overcome business roadblocks.

feature.title: Global Experience & Cultural Intelligence
paragraphs: My journey spans 40 countries, with deep connections in Brazil and Thailand.
This global perspective informs my approach to digital marketing and business strategy.
I leverage my multilingual capabilities (four languages) to bridge cultural gaps in international business.
Each destination has added unique insights to my understanding of global markets and consumer behavior.

social.quote: If you have to wonder about it, choose to trust your intuition.

content: As an early adopter of artificial intelligence technologies, I've implemented AI solutions across various business domains, from customer service automation to content generation.
My approach to digital marketing combines data-driven strategies with creative storytelling, helping businesses stand out in crowded markets.
Through my global network, I've built successful online presences for clients in diverse markets, from local startups to international brands.
